"Typewriter" - A modern keyboard that emulates the feel and sound of a typewriter, with a built-in printer that allows users to print out their typed documents.
"Piano" - A keyboard that doubles as a piano, with the ability to play notes and chords, as well as type on the keys.
"Game Console" - A keyboard designed specifically for type type, with buttons and joysticks integrated into the keys to make it easier to play games.

"Musical Instrument" - A keyboard that doubles as a musical instrument, with the ability to play notes and chords, as well as type on the keys. It also has built-in MIDI and USB connectivity to allow for easy integration with other musical software and hardware.
